title: HAP 48 - Happy Holidays - Two Speeches by Frederick Douglass
itunes:title: HAP 48 - Happy Holidays - Two Speeches by Frederick Douglass
description: In two speeches marking holidays, Frederick Douglass champions the idea of world citizenship, the power of appeals to conscience to bring change, and the role of violence.
content:encoded: In two speeches marking holidays, Frederick Douglass champions the idea of world citizenship, the power of appeals to conscience to bring change, and the role of violence.
itunes:subtitle: In two speeches marking holidays, Frederick Douglass champions the idea of world citizenship, the power of appeals to conscience to bring change, and the role of violence.
itunes:summary: In two speeches marking holidays, Frederick Douglass champions the idea of world citizenship, the power of appeals to conscience to bring change, and the role of violence.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
